alert.note: Alert for Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 2:34PM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus. In Utah, Tavaputs Plateau. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times. Snow and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
